explains: adj. 牙齿的，牙科的；齿音的
wordGroup: dental clinic 牙科诊所，牙科诊室；牙科门诊部
dental plaque 牙菌斑；菌斑；牙垢
dental hygiene 牙齿卫生；口腔卫生学
dental surgery 牙科；口腔外科

sentences.en: I've got a dental appointment at 3 o'clock.
Many of the bodies were unidentifiable except by dental records.
sentences.cn: 许多尸体若不是靠牙科病历就无法辨认。

sentences.en: You will automatically get free dental treatment if you are under 18.
sentences.cn: 18岁以下的人一律免费得到牙科治疗。
